sentence.Network_en: Small and slightly scatterbrained she was in love with the animal world.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然她个子矮小,有点丢三落四的,但十分喜爱一切动物.

entry.tran: 健忘的;没有头脑的;思绪紊乱的
entry.def: If you describe someone as scatterbrained, you mean that they often forget things and are unable to organize their thoughts properly.

sentences.sentence: "how rattlepated I am! I've forgotten what I came for"- Glenway Westcott
"he said I was too flighty to be a good supervisor"

auth_sentence.content: "She was kind of daffy, endearingly scatterbrained, with this butterfly mind," he told me.
